Html:
Hi Mark ,

I want to play .opus file using Naudio.How to possible is this? If possible then provide the class.
No direct support but have a look at this project: https://github.com/JohnACarruthers/Opus.NET
how to implement "https://github.com/JohnACarruthers/Opus.NET" this project to naudio.
have you read the readme file? It says that it includes a demo showing how to use it with NAudio. So start by looking at that.
